website_summaries.verdict: Whether you prefer graphite, charcoal, or pastels, this quality drawing set has you covered. A good option for detailed drawings or fine art enthusiasts.
pros: Graphite, charcoal, and pastel pencils makes it easier to render fine details
Willow sticks and blending stumps help achieve smooth texture and tone for larger areas
Offers a variety of drawing tools in different forms to suit just about any style
A fully professional set that offers everything from a pencil extender to an art knife
Suitable for both enthusiastic beginners and experienced artists
cons: If you like to experiment with color, consider purchasing additional pastels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for an artist
customer_reviews.text: I bought to my teenager girl, she is an artist and draws everyday. She really loves this set, she made a lot of compliments. **English is not my first language. I apologize if I made any mistake. I decided to make reviews of all the products that I bought because the comments from other people have been helped at the time of purchase. I am being 100% honest in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Vic and Nat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit - everything I need to sketch great drawings in one durable carrier. Super-duper happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Deegan

customer_reviews.title: Great Art Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I like to dabble in pencil and colored pencil mediums when drawing. This set caught my eye in finding something that had what I wanted. I got in in the mail a few days ago and it was perfect. I'm happy that it's small and compact so I can take it while traveling. Anyone who is looking for an art kit like this. I recommend you buy it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Meads

customer_reviews.title: It has a fine assortment of pencils and charcoal along with sharpeners
customer_reviews.text: This came on time and everything was as pictured by the supplier. It has a fine assortment of pencils and charcoal along with sharpeners, erasers, and more. I am very pleased with the carrying case, as I was merely using a zippered pouch previously. This will keep my pencils from rubbing against each other & keep all my tools in good condition. I also like the added feature that this case has as it allows me to prop up the row of pencils which will allow me to easily find the one I want when drawing. I recommend this set to any avid artist.
customer_reviews.author: Stubbsusa

customer_reviews.title: Product was exactly as described, even better.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spends most of her time drawing and takes her drawings on the road. This art kit is perfect for her. It has everything she needs to do at home or on the road. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is into drawing or for a gift for an artist.
customer_reviews.author: madtrev

customer_reviews.title: I don't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The blade they give you in this is garbage. I slid the blade up and it fell apart, right out of the case. That said the case by the way is nice and I like the option to prop up the pencils which themselves good. I'm disappointed but overall I don't regret the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Millard

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic art set!
customer_reviews.text: Great art set!! It comes in a nice case and has everything needed for both beginner and experienced artists. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product in my opinion it has great quality and good space, easy to handle. It's very practical for any levels of artist, love the stand Velcro for the pencil's. It's very light weight and comfortable to carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis v.y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any artists
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a friend of my daughters that’s an amazing artist. She had to deal with issues the teacher had about her taking pencils and erasers home to finish a project. We figured to buy her this so she doesn’t have to deal with the ramblings of an art teacher. She loves it and says “it’s exactly what I needed”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap material, high price.  ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I don't get how this product got such a high rating. The material is really cheap. The knife in the set is very small and hard to use. The pencil is made of cheap quality material. Tried to sharpen the wood and it literally chipped. I could get better quality pencil from walmart.
customer_reviews.author: N. So

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the quality. The lead is not in the center. Please see the photo: I sharp them with the same pencil sharpener, the blue one is this product while black is from another brand which is lower cost and obviously higher quality. Money wasted. I won’t recommend this pencil set.
customer_reviews.author: Grace C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Product
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this has 5 star rating, the product sucks. I wanted to make a nice gift for a girl who likes to draw, but after I received the set and saw what kind of cheap Chinese materials are used I would never gift it to her. The knife was missing too. Cheap Chinese product!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit that keeps everything organized
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas gift so I can't really rate the quality of the items individually but the case is great for storing and organizing the included materials. The product was delivered as promised and appears to be as advertised. I am looking forward to giving this as a gift to an aspiring sketch artist.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value and quality. My husband purchased these to get started drawing. He liked that the kit offered a variety of supplies in one kit at a good value. He also liked the addition of the charcoal pencils.
customer_reviews.author: YSal

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice set of graphite pencils. I got it for my little sister for Christmas, she loves to draw, and she really liked the set, particularly how you can set up the pencils so you can see them. Heads up: It didn’t come with the knife though like it shows in the picture. Instead it was a rubber like blurring tool. Honestly not sure what it is or how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Baybay

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner sketcher and it looks like I will have everything I need to explore! The only disappointment was that the pencils are shown in an upright position with something under that holds them up when opened. They are mounted on a backing that stands, but I need to provide something to put under it to hold it up in standing position. Not a big issue, but wasn't exactly what I thought it was. Over all, great supplies for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Tovah, M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: The art supply items were just what I wanted. I am setting up an art studio for my granddaughter for Christmas. I opened the packages and found everything to be very high quality and just as described. The prices were good too. Everything arrived well packaged and was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The art supply I ordered was never received to the friend I sent it to. It was a very special gift. I will never order again from this site. I was extremely disappointed as well was my friend. I ordered another art supply and no problems at all. Also the money I wasted with no gift. Very disappointed !!
customer_reviews.author: Samthecat1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give a 5 for beginner rating only because most kids will not know the purpose of graphite pencils unless they are in some kid of drawing program or really into drawing. I like how the child will be able to lift complete kit while drawing. Seller was great on delivery
customer_reviews.author: kathy v

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for artists
customer_reviews.text: I've been an artist for well over 20 years and could not find art pencils I could truly be satisfied with.Either the hardness of their pencils were to hard or softness to soft. I am very happy and satisfied with the product.Everything came in excellent condition.The quality of line of these art pencils is exactly what I've been looking for.You'll find the hardness of the 5h pencil is neither too hard or the softness of the 8b pencil too soft.Overall in my opinion this pencil set is an excellent and giftable product for the aspiring artist;Even the more experienced one such as I would enjoy implementing,maybe even making these pencils their main artistic tool.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. This kit had just about all the tools my daughter was required to get for her college art class. Buying all the things she needed individually added up to a lot more money so finding this was perfect. She says she hasn't gotten to use everything but loves it a lot so far. It comes in a nice carrying case with a place for every piece.
customer_reviews.author: maggie joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: The art supplies were high quality, packaged superbly and arrived in good time. I highly recommend Castle Art Supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful art supplies
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole thing! I’m an artist.. just doing it for fun. Not my profession. I’m a bio student in that case.. but for the comments I get from my loved ones for my drawings I’ve been drawing and painting and doing much more portraits. U can see my work in @colour_the_life via instagram. But the things done by your products are not posted yet, hoping to post after the things get fine in Sri Lanka😭.. But at the moment.. your products are amazing on my work😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Thinara Sansiluni

customer_reviews.title: Quality, variety, economical, and easy carry.
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of pencils. I generally work in wasters and oils but wanted to get back to basics and more sketching and drawing...ordered more items from Castle. Love the cases for keeping everything together. Easy to take and go. Pricing is good for all. Nice quality of merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The case is very handy and love that you can use it as a stand
customer_reviews.text: I use to draw a lot years ago and now that I'm retired and have some extra time on my hands I decided to pick it up again. Always believed that if you want to do quality work you need quality materials. This set really fits the bill. Has everything I could possibly need plus some. Have only used a few of the items in the set so I only feel right giving it 4 stars. The case is very handy and love that you can use it as a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality drawing set
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole kit! My husband & I signed up for a drawing class together & it had everything the teacher asked us to get as supplies for the class! Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sketch Set!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the package, many sketch goodies inside the handy case, real nice! I bought it for a gift and she was VERY happy with it. Fast shipping and wonderful customer service, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne McKittrick

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Most of pencils are broken. Half is gone just after single use. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I've just starting using but I'm very impressed so far. Good case and great pencils
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great for art, technical drawing, sketches, and drafts
customer_reviews.text: The charcoal and pastels are a nice added touch. All of the supplies work great and are easy to sharpen or shape for use. The case they come in make storage and transport easy and without a hassle or concern about supplies spilling in your pack.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Coralee Leonhardi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price for a Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: As a professional artist it isn't easy to find a quality product that suits your needs. I Recently lost my last pencil case (well over $150 of charcoal, pencils, & etc. ) So I went shopping and after much comparison, I chose this. It's not everything I had in my last case. But it is a really nice foundation for me to rebuild on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Lee Franklin

customer_reviews.title: High quality kit - great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who really enjoys sketching. She loves it, and praises the high quality pencils and the charcoal and extra tools. She really enjoys the carrying case as well. Attached some of the work she's done from some of the pencils (colour added from another set but note the greyscale content)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew de Neef

customer_reviews.title: Great Set! Fantastic Gift! Amazing Seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set as a gift to my wife and she loved it! She's by no means a professional artists, but she loves to do what she does and loved everything that was included in the set. Furthermore, the seller contacted me both on order and receipt of the item to make sure everything was ok and to offer any future services we would require. Ridiculously good customer service. We will be making sure we seek out Castle Art for all future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hair

customer_reviews.title: Not enough for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Should have electric eraser (or hard eraser) and utility knife also. The pencils are recommended sharped with knife instead of pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.author: dreamung

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in one piece. Quality of case is very nice, a little larger then I anticipated but manageable to carry along. Everything you need to start working in graphite or just sketching. And that the holder pockets can be proped up for easy access. A major plus is the customer service. They reach out when product is shipped to say a thank you. And when Amazon reports it was delivered to make sure everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christian a smart

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she love the product, it is what she needed and she is very happy with them. Also I want to thank to all the Castle Art supply, they helped me a lot with a small issue I had with the shipping and it was resolve in a perfect way. Katherine was very helpful in all this matter!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas arias

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an artist, but it appears that the quality of this product is excellent. I am taking an online drawing course and am enjoying using this kit. Great price compared to other comparable art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Beck2

customer_reviews.title: An artist's dream
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my gifted niece. She absolutely loves them and was impressed with the high quality.
customer_reviews.author: otmichele

customer_reviews.title: Great Materials, great selection
customer_reviews.text: I have a young niece who loves drawing and shows a real talent for art. Every year I increase her knowledge and ability. This is my first year helping her with your material. I find them top quality with a wide range of supplies available and I'm sure I will be purchasing many more for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrene

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was first rate!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it had almost everything that I needed for a beginning drawing class. I am impressed with the quality of the set and the carrying case. I sent an email to Castle Art Supplies explaining that the willow sticks were broken during transport and a few days later a replacement came. I am happy not only with the set but with the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: The product is perfect for beginning and even more experienced artists! It comes with a nice array of materials to use, especially for the price. The only problems I’ve encountered is that some of the pencils— for me, it was a 2B, I believe— and the lead continuously broke from sharpening. The inner piece must have been tossed around so it was damaged. I don’t realky mind because all of the other pencils are in good condition. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hana Linder

customer_reviews.title: Castle Art Supplies
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent gift and the case itself is quite durable and easy to transport. All the pencils were presharpened and the entire case is ready for use immediately after opening it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Such a steal!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit for the amount it costs. It comes with a lot of high quality items, you will definitely have a lot of fun using them all!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I love it, I am going to begin using it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I am going to begin using it right away. I just opened it up today and it appears to be perfect. I do however want to know if I can get extra graphite pencils as they will be getting lots of use. I am so excited! Thank you for the opportunity to purchase such a beautiful set, I feel that it has everything that I would need even if I am traveling with it as I plan to do in 10 days. Thank you so much. Becky Lundblad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set. The amount of tools you receive and the quality of said tools for the price can't be beat. This is my first buy from Castle art supplies and I will definitely be purchasing from them again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t drawn in years. This kit has everything you need to get started. The quality pencils and charcoal make the most of your talent. And it’s neatly contained so there’s not a lot of clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Armitage

customer_reviews.title: Beginner to advanced great kit
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to complain about. Ordering process was simple and the kit had everything I needed and more. Love the zip up case.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Czikra Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would recommend for beginners or advanced for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The very best!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pencils for my 17 year old granddaughter. She loves them - great endorsement from a young lady who rarely expresses herself except through her art.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need for the art
customer_reviews.text: Me and my son love this set, it has everything he needs for his art class. Durable, good quality set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is in a very good drawing class in high school, and asked for good graphite tools. She loved this gift and began drawing directly after the last present was unwrapped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm inlove with this so much. It's all so very pretty and su h a good amount of supplies. I'm a beginner and this is all so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer march

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely worth the money! I use this all the time. Love the variety. Everything was very well made and has lasted quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kbastian

customer_reviews.title: The Best Graphite Pencils on the Market
customer_reviews.text: These pencils are remarkable with a wide range of different sizes....A Good Buy....A must for all artists.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love all that has been included. It was in perfect condition when it got to me and everything is just as mentioned! This is a great piece for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Sohini

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Much larger kit than I imagined! I got this AS a gift for my fiance. It seems to have been a hit. I spent a lot of time trying to find the best quantity for the best price and this is the one I went with
customer_reviews.author: Elysse Jinkens

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set for the person looking to advance their sketching technique! Durable carry case. I love it. I purchased one for my 21 year old son and he has started sketching again. Great value. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and ready for traveling
customer_reviews.text: The pencil set and case arrived in perfect condition. The quality of the pencils and charcoal is excellent. I use them for sketching. The case is sturdy and I like that all my sketching supplies are neatly organized and ready for traveling. I would definitely buy this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the sketch artist!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 13 year old grandson. He simply can't say enough about it. He loves to sketch. This set provides him with all types of pencils and accessories for him to create and let his imagination go wild. Always finding new uses for items in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, quality item.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. She loves it, and is very happy with the quality and variety in thiss set. It arrived very quickly. It was easy to order.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for his birthday. He loves drawing as a hobby and is a beginner. This set got him motivated to sketch several pieces and get excited to draw again, it looks professional and works well for a beginner who wants to learn how to use more than just a #2 pencil!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Product is highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: I got this set along with a sketch pad for the "artist" in the family and she LOVED it. The company is small and has a great customer relations department. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift; she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I gifted to a young artist and she is already using the pencils learning shading. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Davis

customer_reviews.title: Integrity, quality, and thoughtful
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with Castle Art reaching out to me twice to make sure I was satisfied with products I had ordered. Thanks so much for your care and kindness. I can tell this company places the utmost attrention into the quality and craftsmanship of their products. I highly recommend this pencil set whether you are a beginner or seasoned artist.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, especially good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a birthday gift to my 13-yr-old granddaughter. She didn't have anything like it and was impressed with thenumber and variety of pencils and accessories. It has a great, convenient case too. She sat right down to use it.
customer_reviews.author: rapper450

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, If I could give zero stars, I would. You will sharpen the pencils down to a stump before you get your third use. The sharpeners that came with the set sucks just as much. The white “blenders“ suck as well. Poor quality EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Brought a smile to my wife's face and she is drawing again
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my wide that used to draw and paint but stopped for about 20 years and just started up again. I bought a leather scetch pad and this set of art supplies. She loves it and has 3 new drawings so far. Bought one for my sister as she started drawing again also. Can't wait for her to get it. Great product and just the smile on my wife's face was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zamarron

customer_reviews.title: consider taking them out if youre just buying this for the pencils and awesome case.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this is that that the charcoals under the 6h pencil falls out because it is too small to fit snugly, consider taking them out if youre just buying this for the pencils and awesome case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Art Suuplies,
customer_reviews.text: Forgot to pack my supplies before we left. The scenery in Arizona is so beautiful, I was just itchy to draw. In less than a week I had what I needed to capture these magnificent mountain ranges here in the high desert.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hale

customer_reviews.title: Let’s see how good they are...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Cons: no white charcoal pencil and kneaded eraser was dried out and barely got it out of the wrapping like it had been sitting in extreme heat. Also the delivery box it came in seemed like it went through hell. Will let you know how pencils are once I use them. Hopefully they aren’t shattered throughout.
customer_reviews.author: The CleanliNest Cleaning Service

customer_reviews.title: Love it. (:
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with my order, for the price it's a great bargain. It's small enough to carry around and it comes with enough materials to draw my favorite mediums. I've also put a lot of my pens in it when I want to ink. There's no extra pouches to slip in more materials but there is a small space under the pencils on each side that can be used to put it 15 more pencils.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for artist!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set for her drawing! It comes with the case too, perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: JasonC

customer_reviews.title: The kit is perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: As my grandson continues to get better and better drawing he loved this set
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to have a full set of drawing implements as I tried to learn to draw. The pencils and other implements were of good quality and easy to use. The set came with a guidebook showing how to use most of the tools as well. I'm glad I chose Castle and will likely be purchasing more of their products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Magiera

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great complete drawing set. I haven't had it long, but I carry it in my art bag when I go out to drawing areas and classes.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Naff

customer_reviews.title: but it's all in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a drawing class I'm taking. I'm not even sure what everything is (I'll be learning that), but it's all in great shape. :) The pencils are sharp, and all the doodads are there!
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I would have bought this, first thing. I’ve been buying little pieces here and there because I’m just getting started, but this has everything I want/need. It’s a great assortment of tools for sketching and drawing and it’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin W

customer_reviews.title: This is her favorite gift and she's been drawing even more since she ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really been working on her drawing and asked for a set for Christmas. This is her favorite gift and she's been drawing even more since she got these. It has everything she needs/wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Xmas present and the case and labeling are very nice.I ordered this kit over others because it can be used by experienced artists as well as beginners.After I see it opened up I can update but so far very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Drawing ✍️ tools
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is an emerging artist. She was so excited to have found this set. Now when she has received it she is so much in love with everything in it and asked me to give 5 stars from her for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Adeela Usman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when i finally received it in the mail! it looks just like the picture and it has everything i need for art class. i adore its accessibility and it's so easily portable even when it's filled to the brim with immaculately placed tools. i bought this with the sketching satchel along with a pencil kit, and it is absolute perfection! art class, here i come!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and really used them till the end.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: La'Crecia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the set everything she needed to draw, doodle and blend
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece. She’s taking art in college and she said that this Arts it was perfect and is of good quality. She was very pleased with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Good day I had a slight problem with the delivery no fault of Castle Art Supplies, but they didn’t hesitate to assist me In retrieving my package in any way possible. However I received my package today, with everything in tact, looks just like the picture, I want to thank you’ll for your assistance and concerns, I would recommend to a friend and give full stars for the great service thank you again. Get Outlook for iOS

customer_reviews.title: Castle Art Supplies Graphite Drawing Pencils and Sketch Set
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It has everything I need. Thank you Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: The kit is very nice looking. And easy to take with you everywhere you go. The tools inside are very smooth to draw with and stays sharp without breaking. The elastics are a little loose and let some of the tools fall freely if your aren't careful. Everything else is perfect for sketching on the go.

product_meta.title: Castle Art Supplies Graphite Drawing Pencils and Sketch Set (40-Piece Kit), Complete Artist Kit Includes Charcoals, Pastels and Zippered Carry Case, Includes Rare Pop-Up Stand
product_meta.description:
Size:40 Piece| Color:Blue

Unleash your creative side with a complete sketching, drawing and designing art set that lets your artistic side shine through. 

Whether you’re a beginner or a professional artist, the right art supplies can truly make a difference in the quality of your work. And when you’re working with poor quality pencils and blending art accessories, it’s going to make your work suffer. That’s why you need the 40-Piece Drawing Pencils and Sketch Set from Castle Art Supplies. 

Draw, Sketch, Design 

Packed with everything you need to go from basic outline to highly-detailed masterpiece, this travel-friendly art kit contains all the essential graphite, pastel and charcoal pencils to make drawing, shading, blending and sketching efficient and gorgeous. 

Cleaner Lines, Sharper Details 

Each of our pre-sharpened pencils and blending tools are made for creating clean, breath-taking details, be it freehand, tracing, stippling, or artistry of your own design. If you’re looking to enhance the power of your artistic ability, get our 40-piece set today and prepare to create something the world has never seen! 

Product Details:

 * Precision, Pre-Sharpened Lead 
 * Travel-Friendly 
 * Beginner and Professional 
 * Non-Slip Grip Pencils 
 * Sketch, Draw, Color and Blend 
 * Convenient Carrying Case 

Order Includes: 12 Graphite Pencils, 4 Pastel Pencils (Different Shades), 3 Charcoal Pencils (Soft, Medium, Hard), Soft Graphite Sketching Pencil, 2 Paper Blending Stumps, Pencil Extender, 4 Charcoal Willow Sticks, 3 Charcoal Sticks, 3 Graphite Sticks, Plastic Sharpener, Two-Holed Sharpener, Plastic Pencil Erase, Kneaded Charcoal Eraser, and Sandpaper Block. 

Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to expand your artistic vision, have fun with your children, and create bold, beautiful art that’s totally unique.
feature_bullets: THE “TOP NOTCH” COMPLETE ART SET YOU “WILL FALL IN LOVE WITH!” This set really has it all, ensuring that your artistic journey is one of enhanced techniques and inspiring results you will be excited to share. Highlights include; an excellent range of top-quality graphite pencils (from 5H Hard to 8B Soft); wood encased pastel pencils in a choice of 4 shades plus Willow Charcoal, Blending Stumps and Dual Tipped Rubber Blender to mention just a few. Join thousands of artists who have count this

SKETCH, BLEND, SHARPEN, ERASE, REPEAT…CREATE! With a plethora of top-quality art supplies at your fingertips, you are free to create, learn, explore, hone and enhance your drawing and sketching skills, whether you are a beginner, an established artist or returning to a previously held passion. We know you will revel in the quality and range of ‘tried and tested’ tools at your disposal.

MULTI FUNCTIONAL ZIP UP CASE CREATES ON THE GO WORKSPACE. Designed by artists for artists, this enviable set conveniently brings together all the tools you need in one sturdy, multi-functional zip up case. Create a mini workspace wherever you go with handy pop-up sections that secure in place with clever Velcro strips, elevating your tools and making it easy to get organised.

EASY TO FOLLOW ‘5 STEP’ TUTORIAL included sharing top tips and techniques that will allow you to re-create the stunning (if somewhat menacing) Gargoyle who adorns the sleeve of your new sketching and drawing set. A great way to get started with your tools and perfect for artists looking for some additional direction. Makes this complete set perfect.

BUY TODAY - WORRY & HASSLE FREE! Creating beautiful art should be easy and fun. Use our step-by-step tutorial (included) to recreate the jaw-dropping Gargoyle on the front of your set. Let us remove any worry or hassle with our unique Money Back Plus Guarantee which means that if you are not entirely happy with your product, we will refund you and you keep the pencil set.
